lyric:
[by:Leonard-Sebastian]
[length: 04:19.006]
[tool: 歌词滚动姬 https://lrc-maker.github.io]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Pharrell Williams/Chad Hugo/Shawn Carter
[00:00.561] 作词 : Pharrell Williams/Chad Hugo/Shawn Carter
[00:01.684] I'm black ambition
[00:04.642] I'm always whispering
[00:07.214] They kept telling me I will not
[00:10.254] But my will won't listen
[00:13.344] Gravity on the black man
[00:16.084] With everything on his back and
[00:19.005] His family and passion
[00:21.873] If the doors ain't crackin'
[00:23.314] You gotta let go (Let go!)
[00:25.667] If you wanna fly and take the leap
[00:29.096] You gotta risk it all (Risk it all!)
[00:31.772] Or there'll be lots of things you'll never see
[00:34.629] You gotta let, let go
[00:38.433] 'Cause you never know
[00:41.458] What's in store
[00:43.655] Mr. Entrepreneur
[00:47.966] In this position with no choice
[00:50.631] The system imprison young black boys
[00:53.601] Distract with white noise
[00:56.530] The brainwashed become hype boys
[00:59.647] Third eye dilate
[01:02.158] You ain't supposed to make it off Section 8
[01:05.153] Robbin' Peter just to pay Paul
[01:08.142] Prepare to risk everything
[01:09.311] You need to let go (Let go!)
[01:12.104] If you wanna fly and take the leap
[01:15.151] You gotta risk it all (Risk it all!)
[01:17.923] Or there'll be lots of things you'll never see
[01:20.999] Remember, black is space
[01:23.701] And it's the color of your face
[01:26.705] There would be no sunny days
[01:30.663] If black went away
[01:33.245] Black man, black man, black man
[01:36.153] Black man, black man, black man
[01:38.956] Black man, black man, black man
[01:41.844] Black man, black man, black man
[01:44.706] Black man, black man, black man
[01:47.640] Black man, black man, black man
[01:50.540] Black man, black man, black man

[01:59.220] Black man, black man, black man
[02:02.054] Black man, black man, black man
[02:04.888] Black man, black man, black man
[02:07.883] Black man, black man, black man
[02:10.726] Black man, black man, black man
[02:13.568] Black man, black man, black man
[02:16.568] Black man, black man, black man
[02:19.168] Don't go chasing waterfalls
[02:21.029] Please stick to the drip that you're used to
[02:23.519] They don't make them like they used to
[02:25.316] Lies told to you
[02:26.612] Through YouTubes and Hulus
[02:28.089] Shows with no hues that look like you do
[02:31.042] Black Twitter, what's that?
[02:32.500] When Jack gets paid, do you?
[02:33.808] For every one Gucci, support two FUBU's
[02:36.552] Sippin' Crip-a-Cola
[02:37.914] Consumer and an owner
[02:39.523] Till we all vertically integrated from the floor up
[02:42.431] D'Usse pour up
[02:43.892] I sip Ace till I throw up
[02:45.265] Like gang signs, 'cept I, bang mines for both ya
[02:48.179] Serial entrepreneur we on our own
[02:50.967] Stop sittin' around waiting for folks to throw you a bone
[02:53.707] If you can't buy the building, at least stock the shelf
[02:57.045] Then keep on stacking till you stocking for yourself (Black man, Black man, Black man)
[03:00.835] See everything you place after black (Black man, Black man, Black man)
[03:02.567] Is too small a term to completely describe the act (Black man, Black man, Black man)
[03:05.565] Black nation, black builder, black entrepreneur (Black man, Black man, Black man)
[03:08.060] You in the presence of black excellence (Black man, Black man, Black man)
[03:09.493] And I'm on the board, Lord! (Black man, Black man, Black man)
[03:11.476] Black man, black man, black man
[03:14.315] Black man, black man, black man

tlyric:
[by:JesusIsYe]
[00:01.684]这是属于黑人群体的追求目标
[00:04.642]我总是低语
[00:07.214]他们一直告诉我 我不会成功
[00:10.254]但我不会听从
[00:13.344]在黑人身上背负的压力
[00:16.084]所有事情都压在一人之上
[00:19.005]家人身上 降低激情
[00:21.873]这扇门若没有破裂
[00:23.314]你得学会放手
[00:25.667]你想于天空自由翱翔 放手去做
[00:29.096]赌上一切
[00:31.772]在那边 有许多你未曾见到过的事物
[00:34.629]你得尝试着去做
[00:38.433]因为你永远不知道
[00:41.458]这梦想商店之中蕴含这什么
[00:43.655]大企业家
[00:47.966]这次没有选择余地
[00:50.631]这套紊乱的系统 禁锢了年轻一代
[00:53.601]白人大噪的地方
[00:56.530]经过洗脑 名声大热
[00:59.647]四处扩张
[01:02.158]你无法脱离80年代生人
[01:05.153]把Peter给抢了 只是为了还Paul的钱
[01:08.142]做好赌上所有的准备
[01:09.311]你得试着去做
[01:12.104]你想于天空自由翱翔 放手去做
[01:15.151]赌上一切
[01:17.923]在那边 有许多你未曾见到过的事物
[01:20.999]记住 黑是刻板印象
[01:23.701]这是你的肤色
[01:26.705]不再有晴天
[01:30.663]若消失黑色
[01:33.245]黑人 黑人 黑人
[01:36.153]黑人群体
[01:38.956]世界需要黑人
[01:41.844]弱势黑人群体
[01:44.706]对黑人需做出改变
[01:47.640]黑人需要理解
[01:50.540]黑人需要庇护
[01:53.403]黑人需要宽容
[01:56.341]黑人需要仁慈
[01:59.220]黑人需要平等
[02:02.054]黑人需要人权
[02:04.888]黑人需要自由
[02:07.883]肤色不是评判一个人的标准
[02:10.726]所有肤色平等对待
[02:13.568]包括黑种人
[02:16.568]黑人 黑人 黑人
[02:19.168]不要追逐瀑布流下的水
[02:21.029]收起你曾炫耀的珠宝
[02:23.519]他们不会让其看着你本来拥有
[02:25.316]对你只有谎言
[02:26.612]通过油管和Hulus
[02:28.089]这看着并不是你的色调
[02:31.042]黑色Twitter 这是什么？
[02:32.500]当Jack赚得第一桶金时 你在干什么？
[02:33.808]每一件Gucci 还有配上FUBU
[02:36.552]喝着饮料
[02:37.914]作为消费者 和原有主人
[02:39.523]直到他们充分融入群体
[02:42.431]倒上大力
[02:43.892]一直喝 直到我全部吐出
[02:45.265]就像帮派标志 为了你们我赴汤蹈火
[02:48.179]我们靠自己创业
[02:50.967]不要再坐以待毙
[02:53.707]你如果买不起一整栋楼 至少买上很多股票
[02:57.045]不断购入 直至满足
[03:00.835]看到了你为黑人群众安置的地方
[03:02.567]一个周期太短了 不足以完成表演
[03:05.565]黑色国民 黑色建造师 黑色企业家
[03:08.060]你存在于黑人优秀集体之中
[03:09.493]而我出于风口浪尖 主啊！
[03:11.476]黑人 黑人 黑人
[03:14.315]黑人群体
[03:17.212]世界需要黑人
[03:20.173]弱势黑人群体
[03:23.033]对黑人需做出改变
[03:25.839]黑人需要理解
[03:28.759]黑人需要庇护
[03:31.674]黑人需要宽容
[03:34.535]黑人需要仁慈
[03:37.423]黑人需要平等
[03:40.319]黑人需要人权
[03:43.196]黑人需要自由
[03:46.060]肤色不是评判一个人的标准
[03:49.011]所有肤色平等对待
[03:51.925]包括黑种人
[03:54.857]黑人需要理解
[03:57.834]黑人需要庇护
[04:00.630]黑人需要宽容
[04:03.431]黑人需要仁慈
[04:06.384]黑人需要平等
[04:09.229]黑人需要人权
[04:12.144]黑人需要自由
